Disk Backup

Installation

  • Install parted if not already installed:

    # parted -v || pacman -S --needed parted

Usage

  1. Unmount source disk!
  2. Find disk size in bytes:

    # parted -s </dev/sdX> unit B p free

  3. Copy disk to file:

    # dd if=</dev/sdX> of=<OUTPUT.dd> status=progress ; sync
